name: TableCellSelector
desc: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a cell.

items.name: columnIndex
items.desc: Specifies a column index. The leftmost column of data has an index of 0.

items.name: descriptor
items.desc: Specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All cells for this data descriptor will be selected. See DataDescriptor.

items.name: evenColumns
items.desc: When true, selects the cells in even columns.

items.name: evenRows
items.desc: When true, selects the cells in even rows.

items.name: oddColumns
items.desc: When true, selects the cells in odd columns.

items.name: oddRows
items.desc: When true, selects the cells in odd rows.

items.name: rowIndex
items.desc: Specifies a row index. The topmost row of data has an index of 0.
